A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Writing should've been for free\, full of deus ex machinas\, just one after another with dry humor in between.  Any star wars fan could have written this better.  Maybe the writer was just bogged down being forced to write it with blatant politicizing and over-the-top political correctness.  The film has a consistent dumbed-down feel compared to the older ones\, too.  Disney-fied all over; not cool\, Star Wars.
